title: Come Move Here!  3 bed/2 bath apartment.
posting_body: ['Thank you for choosing Regal Towers', 'Property Address', '27500 Franklin Rd, ,', 'Southfield, MI, 48034', '<URL>', 'The search is over!', 'We’ve got a charming 1150 Sq.', 'Ft. square foot apartment with your name on it.', 'Come check out our great community and tour your new home.', 'Rents for 3 bed, 2 bath unit is $1,299.00 a month.', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 3 Bedroom', '3 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms', '1150 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,299.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Playground', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Swimming Pool', 'Tennis Court', 'Club House', 'Basketball Court', 'On-site Maintenance', '24-Hour emergency Maintenance', 'Full Equipped Fitness Center', 'Pets are Welcome (restrictions apply)', 'Public Transportation', 'BBQ Area', 'Gated Community', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'David Capaul', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
